title: If the service roads are provided beyond the right of way in permission granted earlier then such service roads may be continued further in adjoining land
clause_text: If the service roads are provided beyond the right of way in permission granted earlier then such service roads may be continued further in adjoining land.
section: Access from the Highways / Classified Roads
